channel.title: (317) Connection Problem! PLEASE HELP (317)
channel.description: Ok so i got this problem when people connect.. They automaticly disconect... Its weird... I want people to play... I am having a problem with the mopar client.. it does not support it... people cannot play on it.. Please help anyone? with my problem? I have changed the ip in my client for ppl to connect to mine.. PLEASE HELP!
